languages.text: "В самом деле,"{n} — немного растерянно произносит девушка, — {/n}"Я просто подумала, что вам... будет интересно услышать это из первых уст".

traits.locale_text: "В самом деле" {n}, – немного растерянно произносит девушка, — {/n} "Я просто подумала... что вам... будет интересно услышать это из первых уст".

languages.text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
languages.original_text: "В самом деле,"{n} — немного растерянно произносит девушка, — {/n}"Я просто подумала, что вам... будет интересно услышать это из первых уст".

traits.locale_text: "Why, certainly," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
"Why, certainly," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
"Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
"Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
"Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

languages.text: “这是当然。”{n}卡西娅的声音不知为何流露出一丝困惑。{/n}“但我本以为……你会想要听到第一手的消息。”
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

traits.locale_text: “这是当然。”{n}卡西娅的声音不知为何流露出一丝困惑。{/n}“但我本以为……你会想要听到第一手的消息。”

languages.text: "Aber natürlich"{n}, sagt sie etwas perplex.{/n} "Ich dachte nur, Ihr wäret ... an einem Bericht aus erster Hand interessiert."
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich"{n}, sagt sie etwas perplex.{/n} "Ich dachte nur, Ihr wäret ... an einem Bericht aus erster Hand interessiert."

languages.text: « Oui, bien sûr », {n}répond-elle, un peu perplexe.{/n} « Je pensais simplement que... un compte-rendu de première main vous ferait plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, bien sûr », {n}répond-elle, un peu perplexe.{/n} « Je pensais simplement que... un compte-rendu de première main vous ferait plaisir. »

languages.text: «Por supuesto». {n}Dice algo perpleja.{/n} «Simplemente pensé que estaría interesado en escuchar el relato de primera mano».
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto». {n}Dice algo perpleja.{/n} «Simplemente pensé que estaría interesado en escuchar el relato de primera mano».

languages.text: 「まあ、もちろんそうです」{n}彼女はいくぶん困惑したように言う。{/n}「あたくしはただ、{name}様が…目撃談を聞きたいのではないかと思って」
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、もちろんそうです」{n}彼女はいくぶん困惑したように言う。{/n}「あたくしはただ、{name}様が…目撃談を聞きたいのではないかと思って」

languages.text: "Elbette öyle." {n}Cassia, bir nebze bocalayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Ancak ben... Birinci elden duymak istersin diye düşünmüştüm."
languages.original_text: "Why, of course it is," {n}she says, somewhat perplexed.{/n} "I merely thought that you would be... interested in hearing a first-hand account."
